How to view the subtitle srt file with the movie.

movie quality fine but subtitle did not get loaded..
even after downloading twice.

other movies loads fine...so whr is da prob??

usually both video file n subtitle file both must b kept in a single folder n while playing it is automatically loads.but that did not happened this time...with trials wth several players...

hope uploader wll help.....

The subtitle file is named differently than the avi file, so it won't be autodetected:

Rashomon.DVDRip.DivX-VCDVaULT.avi
Rashomon.DVDivX-VCDVaULT.srt

Just make a copy of the .srt file and name it Rashomon.DVDRip.DivX-VCDVaULT.srt
